Text: Desktop Weather announcementFpst May Dear Viewer Our records show that you had subscribed to the desktop weather product Storm Signal from ClickHoustoncom Unfortunately the company that developed and hosted the service is no longer able to support it Like you were disappointed Here are instructions on how to uninstall the product from your computer Click on the Start button Select Settings then Control Panel When the Control Panel window appears doubleclick on the AddRemove Programs icon When the AddRemove Programs window appears select the Storm Signal item in the list of installed programs and click the AddRemove button Please Note Your TV station may have its own branding name for this weather product It may be named something other than Storm Signal Follow the uninstall wizard to remove Instant Warning and all associated files However ClickHoustoncom offers severe weather alerts to your email box All you have to do is sign up right here weathersevereweatheralerts In the meantime may we suggest that you bookmark the ClickHoustoncom weather page On this page you will find current condition forecasts weather maps satellite images and radar displays weather Thank you KPRCTelevision
